Package de.framedev.javautils

Class SpigotAPI.DisplayTitleActionBar

java.lang.Object
de.framedev.javautils.SpigotAPI.DisplayTitleActionBar
Enclosing class:
SpigotAPI
public static class SpigotAPI.DisplayTitleActionBar extends Object
Create with this Java Class a Custom Title or Actionbar This class is free to use

  • Constructor Details

    • DisplayTitleActionBar

      public DisplayTitleActionBar(String title, String description, int fade, int stay, int fadeOut)
      This Constructor requires the method showTitle(player)
      Parameters:
      title - the Title to Display in the Title
      description - the Description to Display in the Title
      fade - fade is required to set the time to Display the Title
      stay - stay is required to set the time to stay on the Title
      fadeOut - fadeOut is required to set time to hide the Title

    • DisplayTitleActionBar

      public DisplayTitleActionBar(String title)
      This Constructor is required for the method showActionBar(player)
      Parameters:
      title - the Title is the Text to Display on the Actionbar
